entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
